title: Leftover turkey and mushrooms in a creamy sauce
ingredients: ['30g butter', '1 onion, sliced', '85g mushrooms, sliced', '30g plain flour', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '½ teaspoon grated nutmeg', '150ml chicken stock', '150ml semi-skimmed milk', '350g cooked turkey meat, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'toasted flaked almonds']
